articles.title: Nations Cup back on agenda: Beaumont - Rugby.com.au
articles.description: World Rugby chairman Bill Beaumont has revived the Nations Cup concept, saying that it could be played in consecutive windows.
articles.content:
World Rugby chairman Bill Beaumont has revived the Nations Cup concept, saying that it could be played in consecutive windows.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston reunites with estranged father John - New Idea
articles.description: Jennifer Aniston has previously spoken about how she was in therapy due to abandonment issues, but sources now say because of the pandemic she’s reunited with her estranged father, John.
articles.content:
The actress previously said when she was 10, her father walked out on her mother Nancy. 
News of the dad-daughter reunion comes as John was pictured looking frail and stressed while out in public.
For more, pick up a copy of this week's New Idea - on sale n… [+2 chars]
